cards.name: Eddard Stark
cards.text: Renown. Dominance Action: If each character you control has the [stark] affiliation, kneel Eddard Stark to choose and kill a character with printed cost 4 or lower. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Malleon's Tome
cards.text: Shadow (1). Attached character gains an [intrigue] icon. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which attached character is attacking, look at the losing opponent's hand. If attached character is Eddard Stark or has the Maester trait, stand it. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Maester Gormon
cards.text:
You may look at the top card of your deck.
Once per phase, if the top card of your deck is a non-[tyrell] card, you may marshal or play it as if it were in your hand.
cards.flavor: Maester Gormon sat below the iron mask in Walgrave's place, the same Gormon who had once accused Pate of theft.

cards.name: Unexpected Guile
cards.text: Character with shadow you control only. Shadow (1). Attached character gets +2 STR and gains insight. Forced Interrupt: When a challenge ends in which attached character is participating, return Unexpected Guile and attached character to shadows.

cards.name: Maester Mullin
cards.text: Action: Kneel Maester Mullin to choose a character and a challenge type. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker in challenges of that type.
cards.flavor: "Maester Mullin at the Shadow Tower is more fighter than scholar..." <cite>Jon Snow</cite>

cards.name: Guard Duty
cards.text: [thenightswatch] character only. Reaction: After attached character is declared as a defender, kneel Guard Duty to stand attached character.

cards.name: Ser Eldon Estermont
cards.text: Action: Choose and stand a [baratheon] location. (Limit once per round.)
cards.flavor: "Our cause is righteous, so the gods must surely bless our champion's arms with victory."

cards.name: Shadow of the Throne
cards.text: Shadow (1). Action: Choose and kneel any number of locations with total printed cost 3 or lower. If there is a Kingdom plot card revealed, return Shadow of the Throne to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Chiswyck
cards.text: Pillage. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Chiswyck is participating, discard the top card of your deck to draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: Chiswyck was seated by the fire with a horn of ale to hand, telling one of his funny stories.

cards.name: "Hands of Gold"
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge by 5 or more STR as the attacking player, choose a character controlled by the losing opponent and return it to its owner's hand. (Max 1 per challenge.)
cards.flavor: Hands of gold are always cold, but a woman's hands are warm.

cards.name: King's Landing Proselyte
cards.text: Shadow (4). Action: Kill a standing [greyjoy] character to put King's Landing Proselyte into play from shadows.

cards.name: Outfitted for War
cards.text: Warship location only. Action: During a [military] challenge, kneel attached location to give a participating [greyjoy] character +3 STR until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Jon Connington
cards.text: Shadow (5). Renown. Reaction: After Jon Connington comes out of shadows, choose and reveal a card you control in shadows. If it is a non-event card with printed cost 4 or lower, put it into play.
cards.flavor: I rose too high, loved too hard, dared too much. I tried to grasp a star, overreached, and fell.

cards.name: The Dragonpit
cards.text: Each character whose controller controls fewer cards in shadows than you gets -1 STR.
cards.flavor: None of the dragons bred and raised in the Dragonpit of King's Landing had ever approached the size of Vhagar or Meraxes, much less that of the Black Dread, King Aegon's monster.

cards.name: Arianne Martell
cards.text: Shadow (5). Stealth. Reaction: After a card comes out of shadows under your control, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses a challenge icon of your choice. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: A Pit of Snakes
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a character with no challenge icons and place a poison token on it. At the end of the phase, if that character still has that poison token, remove it and kill that character. (Max 1 per phase.)

cards.name: The Most Devout
cards.text: No attachments except The Seven. Reaction: After a character enters play under an opponent's control, if another character entered play under that player's control this phase, The Most Devout gains 1 power. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Statue of Baelor
cards.text: Action: Kneel Statue of Baelor and discard 1 power from another character or location you control to stand that character or location.

cards.name: The Faith's Decree
cards.text: Play only if you control a The Seven character or location. Action: Name a non-agenda, non-plot card. Until the end of the phase, each opponent cannot trigger card abilities of cards with that name.

cards.name: Manning the City Walls
cards.text: When Revealed: Put a non-unique character with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand. (Printed cost 6 or lower instead if there is a City plot card in your used pile.)
